name: Multicoloured Tetris Variant
description:
CONTROLS
----------------
Up - rotate
Down - move brick down
Left - move brick left
Right - move brick right

RULES
---------
When a group of blocks of the same colour covers all columns, these blocks disappear. The remaining blocks fall down into its place after the blocks disappear. The objective is to make the most blocks disappear.

TWITTER
-------------

Follow my Twitter for updates of this game.
twitter.com/nebulus99
